title: is raka underrated or just not that fun to play?
body: with support builds like {{item:3069}} {{item:2045}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3050}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3065}} she literally becomes a back line instantly heal your ADC for massive amounts while giving them crit and 20% AS.  Her heals constantly able to make use of ardent censor and warmogs + spirit visage gives you the sustain as long as you don't actually take damage from someone to constantly spam your heals and zekes pops about every 10 seconds from heal spams.
